handlers.code:
local debugIndex = 0
local function debugPrint(msg)
    if screen then
        screen.addText(0, debugIndex * 2.5, 2.5, msg)
        debugIndex = debugIndex + 1
    end
    system.print(msg)
end

local startTime = system.getArkTime()
local function getElapsed()
    return string.format("%.1fs", system.getArkTime() - startTime)
end

-- Find container in slot 8
local container = nil
for slot_name, slot in pairs(unit) do
    if slot_name == "slot8" then
        if type(slot) == "table" and slot.getClass then
            local className = slot.getClass()
            if string.match(className, "Container") then
                container = slot
                debugPrint("Found slot8: Container ID " .. slot.getLocalId())
                break
            end
        end
    end
end

if not container then
    debugPrint("ERROR: No container in slot8")
    unit.exit()
end

_G.container = container
_G.debugPrint = debugPrint
_G.getElapsed = getElapsed

debugPrint("===================================")
debugPrint("SIMPLE TEST - Slot 8 Only")
debugPrint("===================================")
debugPrint("")

-- Step 1: First updateContent
debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Step 1: First updateContent()")
local result1 = container.updateContent()
debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Result: " .. tostring(result1))
debugPrint("")

-- Step 2: Wait 31s, then second updateContent
debugPrint("[" .. getElapsed() .. "] Step 2: Waiting 31s...")
unit.setTimer("step2", 31)

_G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] Step 2: Second updateContent()")
local result2 = _G.container.updateContent()
_G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] Result: " .. tostring(result2))
_G.debugPrint("")
_G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] Step 3: Waiting 31s...")
unit.setTimer("step3", 31)

_G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] Step 3: Calling getContent()")
local items = _G.container.getContent()
_G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] Items returned: " .. #items)
if #items > 0 then
    for _, item in pairs(items) do
        local itemData = system.getItem(item.id)
        _G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "]   - " .. itemData.displayName .. " x" .. item.quantity)
    end
    _G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] SUCCESS!")
else
    _G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] FAILED: No items")
end
_G.debugPrint("")
_G.debugPrint("===================================")
_G.debugPrint("[" .. _G.getElapsed() .. "] Test complete")
_G.debugPrint("===================================")
unit.exit()
